title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 30-1.6 - Middle grades tenure area
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 30-1.6 - Middle grades tenure area

State Regulations
A professional educator who is employed to devote a
substantial portion of his time to classroom instruction in the common branch
subjects at the seventh and/or eighth grades in any school where instruction in
the core academic subjects in such grades has not been departmentalized shall
be deemed to serve in the middle grades tenure area. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
30-1.6

Amended

New

York State Register December 24, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 52, eff. 12/24/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
